name: Subtitle Maker
short_description:
Hi, it's still in beta version so I ask you people to feel free to test this out and inform me you found bugs.
if you have any suggestions don't hesitate to present me. I will take a look and add them if I could. once I done the final version I will release all source codes.!


Subtitle Maker Beta v0.1.2012.1.9
Fixed some minor bugs.
External subrip files can be opened through main application.



Subtitle Maker Beta v0.1.2012.1.5 
Main application was developed



System Requirements
Windows NT 4 Service Pack 5 or Greater
.NET 3.0 
And relevant codecs. 


you can now run subtitle maker on Linux/MacOS/ and other *nix Like OSs through Wine. xD  

http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=9828
